com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

Class DefaultScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.AbstractScheduler
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.DefaultScheduler

  • public class DefaultScheduler
extends AbstractScheduler
    This scheduler when provided with a ServiceSpec will deploy the service and recover from encountered faults when possible. Changes to the ServiceSpec will result in rolling configuration updates, or the creation of new Tasks where applicable.

      • defaultConfigValidators

        public static java.util.List<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> defaultConfigValidators(SchedulerFlags flags)
        Returns the default configuration validators used by DefaultScheduler instances. Additional custom validators may be added to this list using DefaultScheduler.Builder.setCustomConfigValidators(Collection).

      • updateConfig

        public static ConfigurationUpdater.UpdateResult updateConfig(ServiceSpec serviceSpec,
                                                             StateStore stateStore,
                                                             ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore,
                                                             java.util.Collection<ConfigValidator<ServiceSpec>> configValidators)
        Updates the configuration target to reflect the provided serviceSpec using the provided configValidators, or stays with the previous configuration if there were validation errors.
        Parameters:
        serviceSpec - the service specification to use
        stateStore - the state store to pass to the updater
        configStore - the config store to pass to the updater
        configValidators - the list of config validators, see #defaultConfigValidators() for reasonable defaults
        Returns:
        the config update result, which may contain one or more validation errors produced by configValidators

      • getResources

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object> getResources()
        Description copied from class: AbstractScheduler
        Returns a list of API resources to be served by the scheduler to the local cluster. This may be called before AbstractScheduler.initialize(SchedulerDriver) has been called.
        Specified by:
        getResources in class AbstractScheduler

      • initialize

        protected PlanCoordinator initialize(SchedulerDriver driver)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractScheduler
        Performs any additional Scheduler initialization after registration has completed. The provided SchedulerDriver may be used to talk to Mesos. Returns a PlanCoordinator which will be used to select candidate workloads.
        Specified by:
        initialize in class AbstractScheduler

      • processStatusUpdate

        protected void processStatusUpdate(Protos.TaskStatus status)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScheduler
        Handles a task status update which was received from Mesos. This call is executed on a separate thread which is run by the Mesos Scheduler Driver.
